availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: A. C. Ellis (Kenton County, Kentucky, deputy circuit clerk)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, deputy circuit clerk. Kenton County native. Son of William G. Ellis and Susan Arnold Ellis. Married to Kate Blackburn Hereford on July 8, 1850. Deputy Clerk of the Kenton Circuit Court in Kenton County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
The Biographical Encyclopædia of Kentucky of the Dead and Living Men of the Nineteenth Century, vol. 1 (Cincinnati: J. M. Armstrong & Company, 1878), 737-738.
Kentucky Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates – Microfilm (1911-1964), KDLA, Roll #7016155, Kenton County Deaths, file #19309.
KYR-0001-020-1486.
